columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event type category ID for the patient estimate.


May contain organization-specific values: No

columns.name: HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The user associated with the event for this line in the event history table.

columns.name: HX_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the event for this line in the event history table.

columns.name: HX_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the MyChart user for this line in the event history table.

columns.name: HX_INSTANT_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant of the event for this line in the event history table.
